name: @wondrousllc/fractal-config-helper
description: Node Library to be used together with the fractal style guide.
author: WONDROUS LLC <hello@wondrous.ch> (https://www.wearewondrous.com)

scripts.release:major: npm version major -m "Released version %s" && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -m "Released version %s" && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m "Released version %s" && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
